EVA HMI Block UI

Block UI is a HMI application for EVA ICS which provides a simple but flexible user web interface for any EVA ICS setup.

Uses bootstrap and jQuery. No HTML or JavaScript coding is required: just download, create configuration files and enjoy!

The app is fully compatible with EVA ICS Control Center Android app.

Screen shots:

Live demo: https://smarthome.demo.eva-ics.com/
